messages.message: Awesome!! Let's chat and figure out how we can solve for them. What's the usecase for Citi? Which sites do they want to scrape/what data do they want to extract?

Its in Citi VCA usecase. They will be uploading a pdf/site url in human review screen based on the extracted information from the first document. Given a url the first solution has to download the pdf/site,  push the downloaded doc/site as input for the second solution to  extract information from the downloaded one.

We are figuring out how it can be implemented using AIHub.

Got it, is there a writeup of the VCA usecase anywhere? Some thoughts on how to start below.

Is the URL public? You can start by checking if we can successfully pull the URL by uploading the URL into Converse (you'll see an option to add a doc by URL).

Assuming that works, we can discuss how to leverage this in a solution. Unfortunately URL upload isn't available via API yet but maybe it could be used as an advanced app. cc: @Aayush

@avi yes it will be a public URL. I can try out in Converse.

Is there a plan to develop an API for AIHub build, instead of using advanced app?

Great, let us know if it works in converse.

There's no plan to create an API for URL upload yet. We'll have the option to add URLs n the UI for Build.

> We'll have the option to add URLs n the UI for Build
@avi How are we planning for adding URLS? Is there any documentation or visual representation? Who is the best person i can reach out to?
when you click add files, you'll see an option to add a URL. for now it's only available in converse, not build yet.
